medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 6 weeks prior to the diagnosis, with persistent flushing and hypertensive episodes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Initially diagnosed with malignant pheochromocytoma at age 28, with a history of left adrenal mass and a second tumor in the liver diagnosed as a metastasis from the adrenal pheochromocytoma.
medical_history.family_history: Negative for any form of paraganglial tumors and tumors of other organs including the central nervous system, eyes, kidneys, and pancreas.
